Title: Provides for the restriction of substances in menstrual products
Summary: Restricts certain substances from being used in menstrual products; relates to the effectiveness of such provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-aaaa, Gen Bus L; amd ยง3, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.1548 & A.1502)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the restriction of certain substances in menstrual products; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the general business law relating to the restriction of certain substances in menstrual products, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 1548 and A. 1502, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
